title.zh: 南京：2025年中国医师协会公共卫生医师分会年会
title.en: Nanjing: 2025 Annual Conference of Public Health Physician Branch of Chinese Medical Doctor Association

description.zh: 2025年中国医师协会公共卫生医师分会年会暨中国公共卫生高质量发展研讨会在南京举行。左钰洁随课题组导师、同门参会，与全国公共卫生领域的专家学者共同探讨公共卫生事业的高质量发展路径。
description.en: The 2025 Annual Conference of Public Health Physician Branch of Chinese Medical Doctor Association and Symposium on High-Quality Development of Public Health in China was held in Nanjing. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo attended the conference with her research group supervisor and fellow students, discussing the high-quality development path of public health with experts and scholars from across the country.

title.zh: 公共卫生医师分会年会现场
title.en: Public Health Physician Branch Annual Conference Scene

description.zh: 中国医师协会公共卫生医师分会年会学术交流现场
description.en: Academic exchange scene at the Public Health Physician Branch Annual Conference
